name: In re Nomination Petition of Luis CRUZ, Jr., Candidate for Representative, 180th Legislative District, Maria Garcia and Nanette Acosta. Appeal of Maria GARCIA and Nanette Acosta
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Cruz

parties: In re Nomination Petition of Luis CRUZ, Jr., Candidate for Representative, 180th Legislative District, Maria Garcia and Nanette Acosta. Appeal of Maria GARCIA and Nanette Acosta.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of April, 1992, jurisdiction is noted and the order of the Commonwealth Court dated April 8, 1992, is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
606 A.2d 896
In re Nomination Petition of Luis CRUZ, Jr., Candidate for Representative, 180th Legislative District, Maria Garcia and Nanette Acosta. Appeal of Maria GARCIA and Nanette Acosta.
Nos. 33 M.D. Appeal Dkt. 1992, 97 M.D. 1992.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 27, 1992.
